# API Reference for cdktf.Aspects

   Aspects <a name="Aspects" id="cdktf.Aspects"></a>
  
  Aspects can be applied to CDK tree scopes and can operate on the tree before synthesis.
  
  # Methods <a name="Methods" id="Methods"></a>
  
  | **Name** | **Description** |
  | --- | --- |
  | <code><a href="#cdktf.Aspects.add">add</a></code> | Adds an aspect to apply this scope before synthesis. |
  
  ---
  
  ## `add` <a name="add" id="cdktf.Aspects.add"></a>
  
  ```python
  def add(
    aspect: IAspect
 ) - > None
  ```
  
  Adds an aspect to apply this scope before synthesis.
  
  ### `aspect`<sup>Required</sup> <a name="aspect" id="cdktf.Aspects.add.parameter.aspect"></a>
  
  - *Type:* <a href="#cdktf.IAspect">IAspect</a>
  
  The aspect to add.
  
  ---
  
  # Static Functions <a name="Static Functions" id="Static Functions"></a>
  
  | **Name** | **Description** |
  | --- | --- |
  | <code><a href="#cdktf.Aspects.of">of</a></code> | Returns the `Aspects` object associated with a construct scope. |
  
  ---
  
  ## `of` <a name="of" id="cdktf.Aspects.of"></a>
  
  ```python
  import cdktf
  
  cdktf.Aspects.of(
    scope: IConstruct
  )
  ```
  
  Returns the `Aspects` object associated with a construct scope.
  
  ### `scope`<sup>Required</sup> <a name="scope" id="cdktf.Aspects.of.parameter.scope"></a>
  
  - *Type:* constructs.IConstruct
  
  The scope for which these aspects will apply.
  
  ---
  
  # Properties <a name="Properties" id="Properties"></a>
  
  | **Name** | **Type** | **Description** |
  | --- | --- | --- |
  | <code><a href="#cdktf.Aspects.property.all">all</a></code> | <code>typing.List[<a href="#cdktf.IAspect">IAspect</a>]</code> | The list of aspects which were directly applied on this scope. |
  
  ---
  
  ## `all`<sup>Required</sup> <a name="all" id="cdktf.Aspects.property.all"></a>
  
  ```python
  all: typing.List[IAspect]
  ```
  
  - *Type:* typing.List[<a href="#cdktf.IAspect">IAspect</a>]
  
  The list of aspects which were directly applied on this scope.
  
  ---
